thread.title: Dissapointing experience, deteriorating standards, zero service attitude.
thread.title_full: Dissapointing experience, deteriorating standards, zero service attitude. - Review of Park Lane Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 557btl
title: Dissapointing experience, deteriorating standards, zero service attitude.
text:
Rooms fair but worn. Unable to get A/C working. The so called Hospitality Reception is totally overcrowded, and not enough seating space for all guests. Staff seems de-motivated and uninterested (with a couple of exception). Deteriorating standards compared with previous visits, and seems to be worse every time I visit. Clearly lack of proper hotel management.
Room Tip: Park views are nice See more room tips
